price: Demikian itu (adalah) di antara berita-berita yang gaib yang Kami wahyukan kepadamu (Muhammad); padahal kamu tidak berada pada sisi mereka ketika mereka memutuskan rencananya (untuk memasukkan  Yūsuf ke dalam sumur) dan mereka sedang mengatur tipu daya.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ أَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayka wamā kunta ladayhim idh ajmaʿū amrahum wahum yamkurūna
